page_analysis.text_content:
Attached garages/carports site planning

• Attached garages must comply with same setbacks as main dwelling.

Note: Uncovered spaces must be located beyond the required frontyard and beyond the first 10' of the street-side yard.

Fig 33 Examples of site planning solutions for attached garages/carports

A 1-car garage with 2nd space (uncovered) located in the sideyard

B 1-car garage with 2nd space (uncovered) located in the driveway

C 2-car garage with no uncovered spaces

Key
— Curb
— Lot line
[pattern] Sidewalk
- - - - Required setbacks
[box with dashed border] Buildable area
[solid grey box] Dwelling
[solid black box] Parking structure
[diagonal lines pattern] No-parking area
[car icon] Uncovered space

visual_elements.description:
Figure 33 shows three schematic site planning examples for attached garages/carports. Each example depicts a lot layout with labeled areas such as 'Rear yard', 'Front yard', 'Street-side yard', 'Buildable area', and 'Main dwelling'. The figure includes three lot types: two 'Interior lot examples' and one 'Corner lot example'.

- Example A: Shows a 1-car garage attached to the main dwelling with a second uncovered parking space located in the sideyard. The garage is adjacent to the sidewalk with a 1-foot distance from the sidewalk.
- Example B: Shows a 1-car garage attached to the main dwelling with a second uncovered parking space located in the driveway.
- Example C: Shows a 2-car garage attached to the main dwelling with no uncovered spaces.

The figure uses a key to denote various elements: solid lines for curb and lot line, a patterned area for sidewalk, dashed lines for required setbacks, a dashed box for buildable area, solid grey for dwelling, solid black for parking structure, diagonal lines for no-parking area, and a car icon for uncovered space. A 10-foot measurement is shown indicating the required distance for uncovered spaces from the street-side yard.

The figure is positioned at the bottom half of the page.
A grey shaded note box containing the text: 'Note: Uncovered spaces must be located beyond the required frontyard and beyond the first 10' of the street-side yard.'
visual_elements.location: Upper right quadrant of the page

technical_specifications.parameter: Distance of uncovered spaces from street-side yard

additional_notes: Page number 38 at bottom left corner.
No handwritten annotations or stamps detected.
Text and figure are clear and legible.
cross_references: Fig 33 referenced as example figure for site planning solutions for attached garages/carports.

qualifiers.text: Attached garages must comply with same setbacks as main dwelling.

conditions.text: Uncovered spaces must be located beyond the required frontyard and beyond the first 10' of the street-side yard.

logical_relationships.expression: Uncovered spaces must be located beyond the required frontyard AND beyond the first 10' of the street-side yard.

execution_sequence.action: Ensure attached garages comply with same setbacks as main dwelling.
Locate uncovered parking spaces beyond the required frontyard and beyond the first 10 feet of the street-side yard.
